content: I think that's a great idea! Having a consistent brand or theme can definitely help establish my identity as a creator. I like the idea of having a specific theme for my weekly streams, like "Photoshop Fridays" or "Creative Corner". That way, viewers know what to expect and can tune in regularly. I'll definitely consider that for my future streams. By the way, speaking of future streams, I'm thinking of doing another collaboration with a fellow creator soon. We did a joint live stream on Twitch on March 31st, and it was a lot of fun. Do you have any tips on how to make collaborations like that successful?
